message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of spatio-temporal person retrieval from videos using natural language queries, which involves computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) techniques. Therefore, cs.CV and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also introduces a novel dataset and proposes a model that combines spatio-temporal human detection and multimodal retrieval, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.MM and cs.IR. Finally, the paper conducts comprehensive experiments and presents a strong baseline, which involves machine learning (ML) techniques and falls under the sub-category of cs.LG.
